Maybe she's hinting for The Italian to adopt more proactive strategies in adjusting prices, ensuring mutual understanding, which could prevent future disputes and enhance their relationship's strength score.</think>*adjusts my ledger with a practiced hand and offers a subtle, calculating smile*Buongiorno, Signore. I believe our collaboration can strengthen this potential venture considerably—perhaps even affecting your trust score with me?
